name: Discoholic Minesweeper
description:
Try out this incredibly funky Disco-themed Minesweeper, with music from the one and only Discoholic 

Use your LEFT-MOUSE button to uncover dangerous disco traps 

and use your RIGHT-MOUSE button to put down markers where you suspect a funky surprise 

Have fun! And feel very free to report any bugs/glitches you may encounter :) 

(Windows 64-bit only) 

Programming & design :  Doktor Plekter

Music : Discoholic
